      • setProfile

        public static void setProfile(android.content.Context context,
                              Profile profile)
        This method is used as complement of the getLastProfile() method. As there we do not get the last profile but we have launched the process Then we will used this one to complete it from the profileDAOExtDB's implementation.
        Parameters:
        context - : This is the context of the MainActivity which has done the request for last profile.
        profile - to recover from the getLastProfile() process.
